ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Cultural Armor & Trolls
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately trolls do not have cultural amour. They can wear the Ogres though. As far as Overthere goes I wouldnt even go there because the prices on
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately trolls do not have cultural amour. They can wear the Ogres
though. As far as Overthere goes I wouldnt even go there because the prices
on everything are double and the last time i tryed the forge it was
unusable. The last time i used Skewer molds was along time ago i purchased
them in freeport. You may need to have a friend purchase them for you. The
only bad thing about this is the amout of trips to get your skill up. If its
possible the best solution is to get your faction up with freeport then go
there yourself. That or the Iskars **howerver thats spelled** town is a
option. I know you can get good faction with them because my troll shadow
knight can enter calibis as long as i avoid necros. =P


Toadak **Da Big Bashers!**
